briefdescription.para: Represents the possible packet type (i.e. modem) used.
Represents the bandwidth values for LoRa packet type.
Represents the possible spreading factor values in LoRa packet types.
Represents the coding rate values for LoRa packet type.
The packet is on variable size, header included.
The packet is known on both sides, no header included in the packet.
The packet is on variable size, header included.
The packet is on variable size, header included.
Holds the Radio lengths mode for the LoRa packet type.
CRC activated.
CRC not used.
Represents the CRC mode for LoRa packet type.
Represents the IQ mode for LoRa packet type.
Represents the modulation shaping parameter.
Represents the modulation shaping parameter.
Represents the modulation shaping parameter.
Represents the modulation shaping parameter.
Preamble detection length off.
Preamble detection length 8 bits.
Preamble detection length 16 bits.
Preamble detection length 24 bits.
Preamble detection length 32 bit.
Represents the preamble length used to detect the packet on Rx side.
No correlator turned on, i.e. do not search for SyncWord.
Represents the possible combinations of SyncWord correlators activated.
The packet is known on both sides, no header included in the packet.
The packet is on variable size, header included.
Radio GFSK packet length mode.
Radio whitening initial seed value.
Radio whitening mode activated or deactivated.
No CRC in use.
Represents the CRC length.
FSR initial value to compute IBM type CRC.
FSR initial value to compute CCIT type CRC.
LFSR initial value to compute the FSK CRC.
Polynomial to compute IBM type CRC.
Polynomial value to compute CCIT type CRC.
Polynomial used to compute the FSK CRC.

memberdef.argsstring: (RadioParams_t *RadioParams, RadioStatus_t *RadioStatus, uint8_t *payload, uint8_t payloadSize, uint16_t timeOutMS, WaitMode_e waitMode)
memberdef.name: LoRa_RX

briefdescription.para: This functions waits for a LoRa transmition with given parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the RadioParams_t structure where LoRa parameters are set.
Pointer to the RadioStatus_t structure where the stack returns statuses.
Pointer to the buffer where the receiving payload is saved.
Size of the payload that is to be received.
Timeout in milliseconds. Will exit the function if timeout is reached. If zero, there is no timeout.
Type of wait mode in which the M4 core waits.

simplesect.para: RadioParams_t, RadioStatus_t, WaitMode_e, coreStatus_t and LoRa_TX

memberdef.argsstring: (RadioParams_t *RadioParams, RadioStatus_t *RadioStatus, uint8_t *payload, uint8_t payloadSize, uint16_t timeOutMS, WaitMode_e waitMode)
memberdef.name: LoRa_TX

briefdescription.para: This functions does the LoRa transmission with given parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the RadioParams_t structure where LoRa parameters are set.
Pointer to the RadioStatus_t structure where the stack returns statuses.
Pointer to the buffer where the receiving payload is saved.
Size of the payload that is to be received.
Timeout in milliseconds. Will exit the function if timeout is reached. If zero, there is no timeout.
Type of wait mode in which the M4 core waits.

simplesect.para: RadioParams_t, RadioStatus_t, WaitMode_e, coreStatus_t and LoRa_RX

briefdescription.para: Uses the DevKit red LED to signal if stack is operating normally or is hanging.

parameterdescription.para: Red LED on Onethinx DevKit will flash at 2 Hz in normal operation.
Pointer to the stackState. Returns the tate the stack is currently in.

briefdescription.para: Use the Unlock function before using any other extended functions.

detaileddescription.para: Enables the use of LoRa/FSK, CapSense. Unlocks Port 7.
Unlocking may void LoRa Alliance Certification by Similarity.
